name: playwright
description: BDD framework using Playwright, Cucumber, and TypeScript

scripts.Runner: cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require-module tsconfig-paths/register --require tests/steps/**/*.ts --require support/**/*.ts --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter tests/features/**/*.feature
scripts.Runner:tag: cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require-module tsconfig-paths/register --require tests/steps/**/*.ts --require support/**/*.ts --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter tests/features/**/*.feature
scripts.report:full: npm run Runner && npm run cucumber:report
scripts.report:tag: npm run Runner:tag -- --tags @tag && npm run cucumber:report
